task.title: Find out Where you Classes are Located
task.shortdesc: This task will give you instructions that will help you understand and figure out where your classroom buildings are located and where you need to go to get to class on time.

step.cmd: Go onto Hokiespa and find your current semester schedule
Print out your schedule so that you have a copy of it while you are away from your computer.
Go to the vt.edu website and search up the abbrivations for each classroom building so that you can figure out the whole name to the building.
Use Google maps to search up the buildings to find where they are located.
Use the Google maps app on your phone each you still need a guide when attending class.
Attend each of your classes on time without getting lost.
